import React, { Component } from "react"; import Navigation from "../components/Navigation"; // import ProductDescription from "../components/ProductDescription"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import { doSignOut } from "../store/actions/actionUser" // import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { allProducts } from "../store/actions/actionProduct"; class ProductDetail extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.allProducts() } render() { let productName = this.props.location.pathname productName = productName.replace("/product-detail/", '') productName = productName.replace(/-/gi, ' ') const productDetail = this.props.dataProduct.list.filter((item) => { if (item.name === productName) { return item.name } return false }) const product = productDetail.map((value) => ({ name: value.name, image: value.image })) console.warn("cek nama produk", productDetail) return (

ROSEHIP OIL

IDR 150.000

ADD TO CART

Description:

Deskripsi Produk

Caution:

For external use only. For best results, refrigerate and use within 6 months after opening.

Shelf life : 6-12 months

POM NA18188102291
Expiry Date : April 2021
What People Think About This Product
Aisyah on 26/04/2020
Great oil, this has replaced my regular moisturizer since then!
Cinderella on 24/04/2020
I love the texture of the rosehip oil as it’s very moisturizing and perfect for making serums with essential oils. Perfect texture leaves the skin feeling smooth and hydrated. Highly recommended.
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ dataUser: state.user }) const mapDispatchToProps = { doSignOut, allProducts } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(ProductDetail);
